Reviews.Title: GREAT camera. cheap accessories
Reviews.Author: Salfa
Reviews.Content: I knew about the camera before I purchased it. My mom owns one. The camera itself is amazing. However, the accessories lack quality. The zoom lens works just fine and has amazing range for the price. The card is a lower end brand but is all you'll need unless trying to get the best you can out of the 1080 video feature of the camera. The bag is okay but one of the clips that hold it shut broke rather easy, so be easy on it. The tripod stripped out very quickly so I can't use it with the zoom lens where I need it most. You will need to cut the screen protector to fit the screen. It is a universal protector. The video is good if your a beginner and would like to learn more about how to use the camera's settings properly. OVERALL: Even though the accessories lack quality, I am satisfied with the product. Was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Setup for beginners
Reviews.Author: Alan Sprague "Fixitman"
Reviews.Content: I have never owned an expensive camera before, but decided the kids are growing like weeds and I want great pics now. This kit comes with everything I needed to get going. It took me about an hour to read the basic use instructions, but it was very easy to get going. I need a lot of practice, but used it at two track meets, and the pics are fantastic! I only wish I would have gotten it a few years ago. I have yet to watch the DVD that came with it, but I know that will help quite a bit.

Reviews.Title: Asavings
Reviews.Author: William McCullough
Reviews.Content: I wrote on my first review that my camera bag had a broken strap. Vendor refunded me for the bag AND sent me a new one. I am very grateful for the service from them. I am enjoying the camera but haven't been able to figure everything out about it. Am taking a class to better understand it.I recommend this vendor.

Reviews.Title: Great so far.
Reviews.Author: Mary C.
Reviews.Content: I bought the Nikon D3100 because of the reviews.  I have a digital point and shoot camera that I am very happy with, but wanted to advance my photography.  I got it out of the box. Put it together and was able to take some pictures to make sure it worked.  This is a Christmas present for me.  I shopped for the best price and Amazon was it.  I plan on taking classes to get the most out of this camera.  Wish me luck.

Reviews.Title: Nikkon 3100
Reviews.Author: Falcon
Reviews.Content: Great package and first camera.  Of course I did have to pick up the "For dummies" book to figure out about taking pics of waterfalls.  Love it, still need to pick up a polorized lens and I will be all set.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal !!
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: I got my camera bundle promptly and the price was the BEST I could find anywhere. The customer service was excellent,as I thought I was missing something, and they were willing to do what ever was required to fulfill the order.

Reviews.Title: Great starter SLR camera
Reviews.Author: Darryl Harris
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about a month now and let me tell you I am quite impressed. I've taken aroung 250 test shots and they almost all came out great! Plus all the extra stuff that you get is a big bonus. Especially the extra lens. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: rnt weiz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product just prior to a family vacation to Florida so that I would make sure I would be able to use it for a family trip to Italy. Just out of the box the ease of use is amazing. I am looking forward to exploring all the great features of the camera and expanding my photographic knowledge. The bundle pack has all that I needed and will need for a long time to come

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3100
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Brown
Reviews.Content: I ALWAYS WANTED A D3100, AND BUYING IT THE WAY I DID WAS GREAT,EVERYTHING I NEEDED IN ONE PACKAGE  I LOVE THE CAMERA AND ALL THE ACCESORIES.

Reviews.Title: •Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Reviews.Author: martin trujillo
Reviews.Content: Well, everything was good but the Multi Compartment Gadget Bag was completely full of Mustiness, I had to wash it before using it because it might affect the lenses and the camera itself, even when it was well packed, it looked as if had been wet for a long period and as I said, it was completely covered by MOLD. It really disappointed me as I was expecting everything in good condition and it really looked like OLD.

Reviews.Title: beautiful setup and incredible price!
Reviews.Author: Lauricia "artgirl"
Reviews.Content: beautiful setup and incredible price! Gifting for my daughters 18th birthday and excited for her new journey as a world traveler and photographer

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Danny Henderson
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent. It takes pictures that are better than I have ever been able to produce with any other camera I have owned. It is easy to use, but also has a lot of great advanced features for when they are needed. Everything in the kit is good quality, with the battery, sd card, camera, lenses, and cable being very good. Since I am not a professional photographer, this is perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nicole Konderwicz
Reviews.Content: This is great for a first camera, especially if your just a beginner.  It was the cheapest price around and it works wonderfully! It comes with all the necessary equipment needed for beginning.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Shannon Morgan
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera a few weeks, but I have captured some amazing pictures! I did lots of research and am happy I decided on this camera bundle.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Mr &Ms.H; "Mr &Ms.H;"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital SLR camera. Very easy to learn to use....takes about 3 days to get the 'Hang' of it. More than I expected. Well worth the money. Takes great pics!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: Chris C.
Reviews.Content: This was a great package for a good price and I have really been enjoying using my camera. When it was available, it shipped fast and I was happy to have it!

Reviews.Title: Great deal for this camera
Reviews.Author: Richard A Przybylinski
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera set up for a reasonable price. I would recommend this to anyone starting out with a digital slr.

Reviews.Title: ALL I hoped for and more
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: So far, all good. Shipping was fine, it was all packed very well, lots of goodies included. Like the camera and still have lots to learn. I am using this for photos of flowers and plants, birds, butterflies and landscapes. Plan to do portraits of family soon.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for a beginer !!
Reviews.Author: kevin l. willis
Reviews.Content: This is my first real camera and I am so pleased by the ease and quality that it provides.  It was a no-brainer to get this package cause of all the accessories that were included.

Reviews.Title: Gift for graduate
Reviews.Author: Montgomery
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter as a graduation gift. She LOVES it, it's easy enough to use and hasn't put it down since she got it really.  Money well spent for the quality and amount of items you recieve~

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3100
Reviews.Author: mayela
Reviews.Content: it was what I was expecting.  thank you, I recommend this item. It was intended for my 16 years niece, and she was happy with it.  Camera arrive in perfect condition and in a timely manner

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: AngiAnn
Reviews.Content: This kit is awesome and comes with just about everything you need.  The camera takes awesome pictures and if you purchase the Nikon D3100 book along with this, you'll be in even better shape.  Once you have the book you can understand how to use the camera to its abilities.  I would recommend this to just about everyone.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Deborita
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome pictures if you know how to use it. I would have liked to have recieved it a more timely manner. But the camera itself is great.

Reviews.Title: Kate's Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: lorraine coppola
Reviews.Content: The Nikon 3100 is a wonderful camera. It is a BD gift for our daughter, who is an outstanding ceramic artist. This camera will allow her to take the high quality picturesshe needs for her portfolios and for all her future projects.

Reviews.Title: Faulty camera
Reviews.Author: Striker
Reviews.Content: I bought this product and received all the items. When i tried to use the camera it kept on saying error press shutter release button on the LCD . After enquiring i released that the camera was faulty. All other items in good working contition.

Reviews.Title: UN FINO DETALLE
Reviews.Author: wilhelm hurtado
Reviews.Content: UN KIT CON LOS IMPLEMENTOS BASICOS PARA HACER BUENA FOTOGRAFIA, UN FINO DETALLE AL ARMAR ESTE COMBO CON ESTOS IMPLEMENTOS

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D3100 14.2MP Digital SLR Camera (Body) - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor - 52mm UV Protection Filter - 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - Additional EN-EL14 Reachargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! Mini HDMI to standard HDMI cable - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3100 14.2MP Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens and Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor + EN-EL14 Battery + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
